title: Remake request did not appear.
body:
My name is UPJedi, I play on EUW and right now I'm a gold 3 player. My last game as Jinx i had a Janna afk. She was not connected during the loading screen and she was not connect in-game. When the timer got to 3 minutes i was expecting a /remake request but It didnt appear. We lost the game because of that bug. All I'm asking is to give my LP back. Thank you.

That game was on 1/15/2017 4:11 PM Portuguese Time.

replies.body:
Unfortunately. we're unable to modify your LP for any reason after the server has recorded a change to it. The system was designed this way to prevent any abuse of it. 

I wasn't able to find a recent match in your match history with a Janna that never connected. Can you link me the match from the match history page or screenshot it from your match history?

http://euw.op.gg/summoner/userName=UPJedi

The game when i went 6/11, my most recent loss with jinx, my janna connected later onto the game. But the point is if the remake request appeared i wouldnt lost my lp...

You could implement a system that finds out when its Riot's fault and automatically does not change LP until the case is solved but that would be too fair I guess.

That's what loss forgiven is about.

It's very rarely actually riot's fault, and usually something in between riots servers and the player, or something wonky in the players setup.
Why is everyone who is sucking riots **** a Janna main on this forum?
and on top rarely play Soloqueue...

I have had this happen before at least twice as well. The last time it happened was in December over winter break. Unfortunately, I don't have the match history page for this but I wanted to back up UPJedi on this since the few times I have had it happen have been extremely demoralizing for my entire team.

 Edit: I went back and found the match through op.gg. It occurred on December 27th in the game where my team was {{champion:23}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:119}} {{champion:99}} vs. the enemy team of {{champion:8}} {{champion:161}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:78}} . Our Tryndamere didn't connect until about 6 minutes into the game as can be seen from his 0 EXP and 0 CS up to that point. When 3 minutes hit, we tried to /remake but were given the dialogue that we couldn't unless a member of our team was dc'd which Trynd was. It even said "Reconnected" when he did finally come back at about the 6 minute mark. At the time of writing, this was about 20 days ago. Here's my op.gg page if you'd like to find the match by scrolling down a ways there, sorry I am not sure how to find the official match history page when it is not in my most recent. http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blakiepug
